text: Basic oil change should be about $100 to $125 for the fit I believe
Apart from that your battery and alternator must check with them
Malaysia is not drastically cheaper for a basic oil change  especially when you consider the costs of driving over and the tolls etc.
Might be slightly cheaper for the parts that you want to change though
I called the car battery company and they believe it’s the actuator problem and not the battery. Then again my battery is 1.5 years   need to change soon
Ooo how much is a Honda fit actuator and battery if want to replace tho?
I think you ask your workshop to advise you instead
Because part and labour costs best coming from them
Don't just blindly trust one place
Once you get the quote from one place
Call another and ask for a price
Bro dont service every 10k  do it arnd every 8k. Yr car will thank you
Sometimes need diy  battery go workshop A  servicing go workshop B to get cheaper price. That’s what I did.
It’s like doing renovation. Get main con to manage everything for you  or find Subcon to do the specific work
